    • Constructor Detail

      • MFAlarmSettings

        public MFAlarmSettings(int timeInSec,
                       MFAlarmSettings.RepeatType repeatType,
                       int windowInSec)
        Deprecated. Currently device doesn't support smart window feature
        Parameters:
        timeInSec - alarm time, it's the offset of day in seconds
        repeatType - repeat type, see MFAlarmSettings.RepeatType
        windowInSec - smart window, device will choose a proper time in this window to wake up the user
